description: This file defines the Polymer behavior 'PaperRippleBehavior' which manages ripple effects for Polymer elements, including creating, ensuring, and customizing ripple effects, and handling related properties and events.

methods.name: _buttonStateChanged
methods.description: Ensures a `<paper-ripple>` element is available when the element is focused.

methods.name: _downHandler
methods.description: Handles the pointer or keyboard press, ensuring ripple effect on pressed state.

methods.name: ensureRipple
methods.description: Creates and appends a `<paper-ripple>` element if not already present, optionally triggering ripple UI actions.

methods.name: getRipple
methods.description: Returns the `<paper-ripple>` element, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: hasRipple
methods.description: Returns true if a ripple effect currently exists.

methods.name: _noinkChanged
methods.description: Updates the ripple's 'noink' property when the 'noink' property changes.
